source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers non-refundable overseas transport and accommodation expenses if trip is cancelled due to unforeseen circumstances.

COVID-19 related cancellation is covered up to benefit limits if it results in serious sickness. Event must occur within 30 days before departure. Policy must be bought >=3 days before departure unless the event is accidental.
Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover applies to this section, subject to conditions.
Does not cover claims arising from transport taken before policy purchase, known events, or losses occurred before purchase.
Covers additional transport or accommodation expenses due to postponement.
Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover applies to this section, subject to conditions.
Does not cover claims arising from transport taken before policy purchase, known events, or losses occurred before purchase.

base_limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person
Limit for extra expenses to return to Singapore - Per insured person

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers non-refundable overseas transport, accommodation expenses, and extra expenses to return to Singapore if trip is shortened due to unforeseen circumstances.
COVID-19 related shortening is covered up to benefit limits if it results in serious sickness.
Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover applies to this section, subject to conditions.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this section.
Does not cover claims arising from transport taken before policy purchase, known events, or losses occurred before purchase.

base_limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person
Limit for accommodation expenses per room per night - Per insured person

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers additional accommodation expenses due to trip disruption.
Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover applies to this section, subject to conditions.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this section.

base_limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person
For every six hours of delay while overseas - Adult
For every six hours of delay while overseas - Child
After six hours of delay while in Singapore - Adult
After six hours of delay while in Singapore - Child

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Payable if the scheduled public transport is delayed for more than six consecutive hours and the delay is not caused by you.
source_specific_details.source_location: Page 2, Key Benefit 4 & Page 3 & Page 10, Note 3 & Page 5, Section 5

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover applies to this section, subject to conditions.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this section.
Covers costs incurred due to missing a connecting public transport.
Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover applies to this section, subject to conditions.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this section.
Covers inconvenience if denied boarding on scheduled public transport due to overbooking.
Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover applies to this section, subject to conditions.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this section.

coverages.coverage_name: If the travel agency becomes insolvent

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers loss of travel deposits or payments if the travel agency becomes insolvent.
Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover applies to this section, subject to conditions.
Post-departure purchase extension does NOT apply to this section.

base_limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person
For every six hours of delay while overseas - Adult
For every six hours of delay while overseas - Child
Baggage delay after six hours when arriving in Singapore - Adult
Baggage delay after six hours when arriving in Singapore - Child

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Payable for delay of checked-in baggage for more than six consecutive hours.
Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover applies to this section, subject to conditions.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this section.

coverages.coverage_name: Loss or damage of baggage and personal belongings

base_limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person
Limit for laptop - Per insured person
Limit for watches, jewellery or valuables in total - Per insured person
Limit for other items (for each item, set or pair) - Per insured person

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers loss or damage to baggage, clothing, personal belongings, etc., during the trip.
Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover applies to this section, subject to conditions.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this section.
Covers loss of cash or traveller's cheques due to theft or robbery during the trip.
Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover applies to this section, subject to conditions.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this section.

base_limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person
Limit for accommodation expenses per room per night - Per insured person

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers costs of replacing lost or stolen passport, visa, or travel tickets, plus related accommodation expenses.
Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover applies to this section, subject to conditions.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this section.

coverage_categories.category_name: Personal Accident and Medical Expenses Benefits

base_limits.type: Accidental Death/Permanent Disability - Adult 70 years old or over
Accidental Death/Permanent Disability - Adult under 70 years old
Public transport double cover for accidental death - Adult 70 years old or over
Public transport double cover for accidental death - Adult under 70 years old
Public transport double cover for accidental death - Child

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Provides compensation for accidental death or permanent disability based on the scale of compensation (a-h, max 100% of benefit limit). Public transport double cover is not available under the Classic plan.
Standard plans do not cover pre-existing medical conditions.
Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover applies to this section, subject to conditions.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this section.

base_limits.type: Adult 70 years old or over (combined for sections 14, 18 and 19)
Limit for medical aids and equipment - Per insured person

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers necessary medical treatment for unexpected injury or illness incurred overseas, including COVID-19 related treatment (subject to plan limits).
Standard plans do not cover pre-existing medical conditions.
Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover applies to this section, subject to conditions.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this section.
Policy automatically extends up to 14 days if hospitalised overseas.

base_limits.type: Overall section limit - Adult 70 years old or over
Overall section limit - Adult under 70 years old
Limit for medical aids and equipment - Per insured person

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers follow-up medical treatment in Singapore within a specified period after returning, for injury/illness first treated overseas.
Standard plans do not cover pre-existing medical conditions.
Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover does NOT apply to this section.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this section.

coverages.coverage_name: Treatment by a Chinese medicine practitioner or a chiropractor

base_limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person
Limit per visit - Per insured person

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers treatment by a registered Chinese medicine practitioner or chiropractor incurred during the trip.
Refer to policy conditions for specific requirements and sub-limit per visit.
Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover applies to this section, subject to conditions.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this section.

base_limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person
Benefit per day - Per insured person

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Provides a daily cash benefit for each day of hospital confinement overseas due to injury or illness.
Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover applies to this section, subject to conditions.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this section.
Covers expenses for emergency medical evacuation to Singapore or the nearest appropriate medical facility if necessary due to serious injury or illness.
Limit for Adult 70 years old or over is combined with Medical Expenses Overseas (Sec 14) and Sending You Home (Sec 19).
Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover applies to this section, subject to conditions.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this section.
Covers expenses for repatriation of mortal remains or costs of local burial/cremation overseas.
Limit for Adult 70 years old or over is combined with Medical Expenses Overseas (Sec 14) and Emergency Medical Evacuation (Sec 18).
Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover applies to this section, subject to conditions.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this section.

base_limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person
Limit for accommodation expenses per room per night - Per insured person

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers travel and accommodation expenses for one relative or friend to travel to you if you are hospitalised overseas for a specified period.
Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover applies to this section, subject to conditions.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this section.

base_limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Provides a daily benefit if you are unlawfully detained against your will during the trip.
Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover applies to this section, subject to conditions.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this section.

base_limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers overseas telephone charges incurred for contacting emergency assistance services.
Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover applies to this section, subject to conditions.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this section.

base_limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person
Limit per item (for each item, set or pair) - Per insured person

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers loss or damage to home contents due to burglary or fire while your home is unoccupied during your trip.
Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover applies to this section, subject to conditions.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this section.
Covers legal liability for accidentally injuring someone or damaging their property during the trip.
Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover applies to this section, subject to conditions.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this section.
Covers the insurance excess you are liable to pay if your rental vehicle is damaged or stolen during the trip.
Full terrorism cover applies to this section.
COVID-19 cover applies to this section, subject to conditions.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this section.

Covers participation in specified leisure activities (water, winter, air, outdoor like hiking/trekking<4000m) if safety procedures followed, under licensed guidance if available. Scuba requires PADI (or similar) cert, buddy system, or qualified instructor, max depth per cert (not >30m). Trekking must be public access, organised by commercial operator, or under licensed guide supervision with safety gear.
Excludes extreme sports involving speed, height, danger, high physical exertion, specialized gear, or stunts.

Covers 1 or 2 adults (spouses/partners, >=16yrs, parent/guardian) and any number of their children (<21yrs, biological/adopted/ward). All must be insured under the same policy. Adults and children must travel together if insured under single trip plans.
'Family total' in tables is the maximum amount payable per benefit section under family cover for any one trip.

Coverage period automatically extended at no extra cost for the first 14 days while overseas if unable to return before policy expiry due to delay of public transport (not caused by you) or hospitalisation as advised by a medical practitioner.
Available for purchase within one day after departure from Singapore (only applicable to Per-trip plans).
Provides post-departure benefits (e.g., medical expenses overseas, emergency medical evacuation) as specified under Section 28.
Does not cover claims arising from transport taken before policy purchase, known events, or losses occurred before purchase.
Provides cover for losses arising from acts of terrorism for benefits under sections 1 to 25, up to the limits specified in Section 26.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this section.

base_limits.limit: See limits of respective sections that apply

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Applies to sections 1 to 25, except section 15 (Medical expenses in Singapore).

Requires fulfilling all vaccination, pre-departure tests, and post-arrival tests imposed by destination country or transport operator. For Section 1 (Cancelling trip), COVID-19 must result in a serious sickness.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this section.
